summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2006 SUNLINE T2075 TRAILER EQUIPPED WITH MISSION ST TIRES, SIZE: 205 75 R15. THE CONTACT STATED THAT WHILE TRAVELING BETWEEN 40 AND 50 MPH, THE FRONT DRIVER AND PASSENGER SIDE REAR TIRES EXPLODED. THE FAILURE OCCURRED THE VERY NEXT DAY ON THE FRONT PASSENGER SIDE TIRE. THE TIRES WERE REPLACED. THE CONTACT WAS UNAWARE OF THE CAUSE OF THE FAILURE.  THE VIN AND DOT NUMBER WAS UNKNOWN. THE MANUFACTURER WAS NOT MADE AWARE OF THE FAILURE.
